backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a mathematics learning platform with problem management, user profiles, submissions tracking, progress stats, UPI payment handling, and role-based authorization (admin/user permissions).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features related to generating and displaying the Rajat's Equation logo in the Hero section with responsive sizing and proper positioning.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files including components for Hero, ProblemGenerator, ProgressTracker, Footer, authentication, profile setup, course offering, PWA configuration, and styling with Rajat's Equation branding.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, featuring dark navy blue primary brand colors and border/typography base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, manifest link, apple-touch-icon references, navy blue theme color, and title "Rajat's Equation - Master Mathematical Thinking".
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata for "Rajat's Equation - Mathematics Platform" with standalone display mode, navy theme color, and references to generated app icons at 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, network-first for API calls, with install/activate/fetch event handlers for offline PWA functionality.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing authentication state, profile setup flow, theme provider, and rendering Hero, Services, EnrollmentCTA, and Footer components with conditional ProfileSetup modal.
frontend/src/components/CourseOffering.t: Course purchase component displaying "Comprehensive Mathematics Program" with benefits list, UPI payment integration (9424135055@ptyes), authentication-gated access, and purchase status tracking.
frontend/src/components/EnrollmentCTA.ts: Enrollment call-to-action component displaying benefits of the math program with cards and a UPI payment button. Features gradient backgrounds, benefit icons, and a trust badge.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with branding, social media links (WhatsApp, YouTube, LinkedIn), and attribution to caffeine.ai. Includes logo and copyright information.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component with logo, headline, description, and action buttons for enrollment and exploring programs. Includes optional PWA install button and hero banner image.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component using Internet Identity integration. Handles login/logout states with loading indicators and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProblemGenerator: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form component for new users to enter their name. Uses mutation hook to save user profile and displays welcome message on success.
Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Services section component displaying six math program offerings in a grid layout. Each service card includes an icon, title, and description for different preparation courses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication. Handles actor lifecycle, query invalidation, and admin token initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInstallPrompt.ts: Custom hook for PWA installation functionality. Manages beforeinstallprompt event, tracks installation state, and provides installApp function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend API calls including user profile management, course details retrieval, course purchase, and UPI payment recording/status checking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining brand colors (navy), sidebar styles, and typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom fonts (Inter, Georgia, Cal Sans), OKLCH-based color system with brand navy colors, container settings, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a math edtech platform for Rajat's Equation, repositioned as marketing/enrollment site with UPI payment integration, multiple course offerings, and contact details.
